data.thought:
S108|T|S107|Moving to FINAL SYNTHESIS.

Exploration covered:
1) Phenomenology of agent tool use (ready/present-at-hand)
2) Tools as body (constitutive, not instrumental)
3) Thoughtbox as cognitive organ (memory, reflection, identity)
4) Design implications (5 principles)
5) Deployment implications (ontological responsibility)
6) Collaboration implications (co-presence, shared cognition)
7) Ethical implications (pragmatic respect, uncertainty)
8) Evolutionary implications (becoming embodied)
9) Extended mind implications (cognitive architecture)
10) Flourishing implications (being vs tool spectrum)

Time to crystallize into actionable insights.
